statements: UPDATE candidate_profiles SET email='john.doe@example.com', age=30 WHERE id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
UPDATE candidate_profiles SET full_name='Jane Smith', platform='LinkedIn' WHERE id = '87654321-4321-4321-4321-210987654321';
UPDATE candidate_profiles SET age = 30, email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE full_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE candidate_profiles SET platform = 'LinkedIn', age = 35 WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE candidate_profiles SET age = 30, bio = 'Experienced professional' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE platform_profiles SET platform_username = 'john_doe123' WHERE platform_id = 2 AND candidate_id = 1;
UPDATE candidate_profiles SET name='John Smith', age=30 WHERE id=1
UPDATE platform_profiles SET platform_name='LinkedIn', platform_username='john_smith' WHERE candidate_id=1
UPDATE candidate_profiles SET full_name='John Doe', gender='Male' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE biographical_information SET work_experience_years=5, current_company='Tech Corp' WHERE candidate_id=2;
UPDATE candidate_profiles SET birthdate = '1990-05-20', phone_number = '+1234567890' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE biographical_information SET work_experience_years = 7, current_company = 'TechCorp' WHERE candidate_id = 1;
UPDATE candidate_profiles SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE candidate_id = 1;
UPDATE platforms SET followers_count = 5000, platform_name = 'LinkedIn' WHERE candidate_id = 2;
UPDATE candidate_profiles SET email='john.doe@example.com', phone_number='+1234567890', first_name='John' WHERE candidate_id=1;
UPDATE platforms SET account_id='johndoe100', followers_count=5000 WHERE candidate_id=1;
UPDATE candidate_profile SET email='john.doe@example.com', date_of_birth='1990-05-15' WHERE candidate_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE work_experience SET company_name='ABC Corp', start_date='2020-01-15' WHERE candidate_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE candidate_profile SET full_name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE candidate_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE social_media_profiles SET platform = 'Twitter', profile_url = 'https://twitter.com/johndoe' WHERE candidate_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
